title: [Soled Out, Workroom]
description: Behind a wall of parchment screens, the gossamer panels draped over the pavilion have been drawn back, affording a spectacular view of the meadow.  A shoe form rests upon a sturdy worktable littered with tools, inked designs, and measuring cords.  Beneath the table, neatly labeled boxes containing a variety of footwear await delivery to their new owners.
